items.sentence: When I retire, I\'d like to spend the rest of my life in the country.
When you love someone, you\'ll do anything to make that person happy.
When I got home, I realized that one of my suitcases had disappeared.
Our server will be offline on October 20th for scheduled maintenance.
Tom wants Mary to know he\'s not planning on asking her to marry him.
Tom wants to learn boxing, but his mother thinks it\'s too dangerous.
Don\'t worry, Mom. He isn\'t particular about food. He eats anything.
I don\'t care how much you want it. I\'m not going to give it to you.
I don\'t know about you guys, but I\'m buying Tom a birthday present.
Boston is a great place to visit, but I wouldn\'t want to live there.
Even though Tom and Mary are twins, they don\'t look very much alike.
Have you thought any more about what you\'re going to do next summer?
Tom tells everyone that he can\'t speak French, but that\'s not true.
I should\'ve studied French more seriously when I was in high school.
Tom and his classmates are going to an art museum tomorrow afternoon.
Was the book that you were reading yesterday in French or in English?
I bought a house with the money that I inherited from my grandfather.
I don\'t think I want to answer any more of your questions right now.
I don\'t want Tom to make the situation any worse than it already is.
I don\'t want a lot of money. I just want enough to live comfortably.
